title: i'm worried
body:
ok so I found out my password was changed without me knowing so I changed it back but why did it change without me? I'm just worried why. can a rioter tell me why this happened? I'm worried if I was hacked and it changed my password and such because, I don't want this to happen to me again or at all. plz answer asap 



-a concerned/worried player

replies.body: I've gone ahead and checked out your account for you, and it does look like there was a point last month where someone could have hacked their way onto your account. No worries, it doesn't seem like any damage has been done or that they're still there, but I'd suggest reaching out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) juuuuust in case!
